name: Outerra Captured Video File
summary: Learn about .YOG files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You can convert YOG files to .AVI files using Outerra's YOG converter, which is based on FFmpeg and includes a YOG conversion plug-in. A .BAT script called conv.bat converts the video to .AVI, and another script called conv4edit.bat converts the video into the MJPEG format for video editing frame by frame.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
